metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22815 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
path_getbbox in path.c in Pillow before 9.0.0 improperly initializes ImagePath.Path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7').
